product_name: Oakley Swim O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: Get your splash on in the Oakley Swim O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top. Lace-like detail makes a stylish statement while an athletic racerback offers plenty of support for all-day play. Stretchy nylon fabric with stretch-polyester lining allows easy movement; removable molded cups add shape. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Oakley Swim O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top features a racerback rear with hook closure.
short_description: Get your splash on in the Oakley Swim O-Laser Long Triangle Bikini Top. Lace-like detail makes a stylish statement while an athletic racerback offers plenty of support for all-day play.
